Title: Paranoia
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Gabe Liedman, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The precinct tries to set up perfect bachelor and bachelorette parties for Adrian and Rosa after they announce their engagement, but Adrian's party falls apart when he tells everyone that someone is stalking him and steals the party bus.
